title: Embroidered Picture, 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: chain, satin, stem, knots, surface and buttonhole stitches; contemporary stumpwork
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 1.6 x 25 cm (5/8 x 9 13/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Two figures dressed in textiles (over padding) with embroidered details; embroidered dog, tree, flowers and insects. Lined with white silk.
